duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee large multi-year IT and Cyber projects, including schedule integration, resource management, risk management, cost management, stakeholder management, and executive reporting.
Execute and integrate across enterprise workstreams and technical disciplines, including outside of the Information Solutions and Services (IS&S) organization.
Perform continuous monitoring of Enterprise Risk Management elements related to Technology related projects and identify and resolve cross-project and cross-workstream issues.
Gather and analyze key execution metrics related to technology projects and provide recommendations to project managers and workstream POCs.
Support integration across technology projects through the sharing of information and involvement on cross-project and workstream projects.
Early identification and mitigation of emerging Technology program risks through data analysis and SME deep dive reviews.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in IT, Management, or a related field (Master’s degree a plus), PMP Certification
